type.name: type_point_openaq
type_sounding_wyoming
type.property: fields=pressure[unit="hPa" label="pressure" type=double],height[unit="meters" label="Height" type=double],temperature[unit="C" label="Temperature" type=double],dewpoint[unit="C" label="Dewpoint" type=double],relative_humidity[unit="%" label="Relative humidity" type=double],mixing_ratio[unit="g/kg" label="Mixing ratio" type=double],wind_direction[unit="degrees" label="Wind direction" type=double],wind_speed[unit="knots" label="Wind speed" type=double],theta[unit="K" label="Theta" type=double],thetae[unit="K" label="Theta-E" type=double],thetav[unit="K" label="Theta-V" type=double] picky=false delimiter=space point.csvcommands=-skip, 10,-stop,.*<PRE>.*,-print
type.wiki:
+section title={{name}} {{description wikify=true}}
{{display type=skewt layoutHere=true skewtWidth="550" skewtHeight="550" hodographWidth=200 showMenu=false showTitle=false}}
:br +row +col-md-9 {{information details="true" showTitle="false" }} -col +col-3 Data courtesy of :br [http://weather.uwyo.edu/upperair/sounding.html University of Wyoming] {{map}} -col -row -section

type.name: type_sounding_cod
type.property: fields=level[type=string],pressure[unit="mb" label="pressure" type=double],height[unit="meters" label="Height" type=double],temperature[unit="C" label="Temperature" type=double],dewpoint[unit="C" label="Dewpoint" type=double],relative_humidity[unit="%" label="Relative humidity" type=double],dd[label="DD" unit="C" type="double"],wetbulb[label="Wet Bulb" unit="C" type="double"],wind_direction[unit="degrees" label="Wind direction" type=double],wind_speed[unit="knots" label="Wind speed" type=double],theta[label="Theta" unit="K" type=double],thetav[unit="K" label="Theta-V" type=double],thetaw[unit="K" label="Theta-W" type=double],thetae[unit="K" label="Theta-E" type=double],mixing_ratio[unit="g/kg" label="Mixing ratio" type=double] picky=false point.csvcommands=-delimiter,spaces,-start,(?s)----.*,-start,(?s)----.*,-stop,(?s)TRP.*,-print
type.wiki:
+section title={{name}} {{description wikify=true}}
{{display type=skewt layoutHere=true skewtWidth="550" skewtHeight="550" hodographWidth=200 showMenu=false showTitle=false}}
:br +row +col-md-9 {{information details="true" showTitle="false" }} -col +col-3 Data courtesy of :br [https://weather.cod.edu/buildmap/analysis/raob_build.php College of Dupage] {{map}} -col -row -section

type.name: type_sounding_frd
type.property: fields=ix[],time[ ], pressure[ unit=mb missing=-999], temperature[ c missing=-999], rh[ unit=% missing=-999], height[ unit=m missing=-999], winddirection[ missing=-999], windspeed[ unit=m/s missing=-999], u[ unit=m/s missing=-999], v[ unit=m/s missing=-999], ns[ missing=-999] wz[ unit=m/s missing=-999], zw[ unit=m missing=-999], fp[ missing=-999], ft[ missing=-999], fh[ missing=-999], fw[ missing=-999], lat[ missing=-999], lon[ missing=-999] delimiter=space lastHeaderPattern=IX.*

type.name: type_sounding_gsd
type.property: fields=cape[type=double],pressure[unit="mb" label="pressure" type=double],height[unit="meters" label="Height" type=double],temperature[unit="C" label="Temperature" type=double],dewpoint[unit="C" label="Dewpoint" type=double],wind_direction[unit="degrees" label="Wind direction" type=double],wind_speed[unit="knots" label="Wind speed" type=double],date[type=date format=yyyy-MMM-dd-HH'Z' label=Date],latitude[label="Latitude" type=double],longitude[label="Longitude" type=double] point.csvcommands=-alldata,-skip,7,-widths,7_comma_7_comma_7_comma_7_comma_7_comma_7_comma_7, -change,0-6,99999,NaN, -macro,(\d\d) +(\d\d) +([a-zA-Z]+) +(\d\d\d\d),{4}-{3}-{2}-{1}Z, none, -macro,from *([-0-9\.]+)_comma_,{1},none,-macro,from *[^_comma_]+_comma_([^:]+):,{1},none, -scale, 1, 0, 0.1, 0, -scale, 3, 0, 0.1, 0, -scale, 4, 0, 0.1, 0, -decimals, 1_comma_2_comma_3, 10, -print
type.wiki:
+section title={{name}} {{description wikify=true}}
+row +col-8 {{display type=skewt layoutHere=true skewtWidth="500" skewtHeight="550" hodographWidth=150 showMenu=false showTitle=false}} -col +col-4 Click to select new sounding {{display type="map" showTitle="false" showMenu="false" justOneMarker="true"}} -col -row
:br +row +col-md-9 {{information details="true" showTitle="false" }} -col +col-3 Data courtesy of :br [https://rucsoundings.noaa.gov/ NOAA] -col -row -section

type.name: type_sounding_atomic

property.name: record.patterns
property.value: latitude:Release point latitude *([^ ].*),longitude:Release point longitude *([^ ].*),date:Balloon release date and time\s*([^\s].*),sonde_type:Sonde type *([^ ].*),sonde_serial:Sonde serial number *([^ ].*),station:Station name *([^ ].*)

type.property: fields=elapsed_time[],height[unit=m], pressure[ unit=mb missing=-999], temperature[ unit=c missing=-999], rh[ unit=% missing=-999],dewpoint[] , wind_direction[ missing=-999], wind_speed[ unit=m/s missing=-999], ecomp[missing=-999], ncomp[missing=-999], timeutc[format="yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" type="date" isDateOffset="true"], gps_height_msl[ unit=m/s missing=-999], latitude[ missing=-999], longitude[ missing=-999], asc_rate[] delimiter=spaces ##one or more spaces then an 's' lastHeaderPattern=^ +s.*

type.name: type_daymet
type_tmy
